entities.description: The raw count of survey responses without any adjustments for weighting.
The percentage representation of the unweighted frequency out of the total cases.
The identifier code for different survey conditions or responses.
The detailed description of what each SurveyCode represents.
The number of survey responses considered valid out of the total cases.
The type of variable used in the survey (e.g., numeric).
The position of the variable in terms of starting point, width, and decimal places.

relationships.description: Specifies the raw count of responses for each survey condition.
Specifies the percentage for each survey condition based on the unweighted frequency.
Associates each survey condition with a specific identifier code.
Provides a description for each survey code to explain what it represents.
Indicates the total number of valid survey responses out of the total cases.
Defines the type of variable used in the survey.
Specifies the location details of the variable.
